name: PoSciDonDAO
description: PoSciDonDAO is a community-governed collective that streamlines and democratizes funding of personalized medicine research for life-altering diseases. The PoSciDonDAO protocol facilitates transactions from donors and investors to scientists by leveraging blockchain’s most important features: transparency, decentralization and censorship-resistance. In this way, this protocol not only benefits scientific funding, but also investors, scientists and other members of the DAO.
tokenDescription: The $SCI token is PoSciDonDAO's only tradable token. Staking of this token provides members with the right to vote on proposals and have a say in PoSciDonDAO’s future. Stay tuned for the $SCI launch!
